name: Little Mermaid Baby Talking Friends Princess Dress Up Tale for iPhone & iPod Touch
name_original: Little Mermaid Baby Talking Friends Princess Dress Up Tale for iPhone & iPod Touch
description:
Hurray, you found me! It’s me LITTLE MERMAID. Join my magic underwater world today
Come play & talk with me, plus hear my story

INTERACT and HEAR MY STORY
I repeat back whatever you say
Hear my story about the other mermaids, my friends, and dreams -- over 100 things to say
Play with me at night, day, and morning for a totally new experience – 3 different scenes

COMPATIBILITY
Compatible with all iPod Touch, iPhone and iPad models
iPod Touch 1, 2, 3 generation owners: Your earphones must have a microphone otherwise I cannot hear you.
